category_subcategory.title: sql injection
category_subcategory.summary: sql injection is an attack where the user can tamper with the sql request send by the server too return, delete, add data that wasn't intended
category_subcategory.problem: unsafe user input that is added too the sql query
category_subcategory.solution: use prepared sql statements on your backend and sanitize user input by escaping and formating it
category_subcategory.examples: bvb een slider of iets dat je hier voorbeelden van kan zien in meerdere programmeer talen
category_subcategory.resources: bvb library's of tooltjes wat kan helpen met het probleem
